parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: The appointment that scheduled this encounter

parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: The ServiceRequest that initiated this encounter

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: Classification of patient encounter

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

parameters.name: diagnosis
parameters.description: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter

parameters.name: episode-of-care
parameters.description: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length of encounter in days

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location the encounter takes place

parameters.name: location-period
parameters.description: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

parameters.name: part-of
parameters.description: Another Encounter this encounter is part of

parameters.name: participant
parameters.description: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

parameters.name: participant-type
parameters.description: Role of participant in encounter

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient or group present at the encounter

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

parameters.name: reason-code
parameters.description: Coded reason the encounter takes place

parameters.name: reason-reference
parameters.description: Reason the encounter takes place (reference)

parameters.name: service-provider
parameters.description: The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter

parameters.name: special-arrangement
parameters.description: Wheelchair, translator, stretcher, etc.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The patient or group present at the encounter

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specific type of encounter

info.description: An interaction during which services are provided to the patient
info.title: FHIR R4 Encounter Resource

Encounter.description: An interaction during which services are provided to the patient

account.description: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter.

appointment.description: The appointment that scheduled this encounter.

basedOn.description: The request this encounter satisfies (e.g. incoming referral or procedure request).

episodeOfCare.description: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

identifier.description: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known.

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

length.description: Quantity of time the encounter lasted. This excludes the time during leaves of absence.

partOf.description: Another Encounter of which this encounter is a part of (administratively or in time).

period.description: The start and end time of the encounter.

priority.description: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

reasonCode.description: Coded reason the encounter takes place

serviceProvider.description: The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter

serviceType.description: Broad categorization of the service that is to be provided (e.g. cardiology).

status.description: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +.

subject.description: The patient or group present at the encounter.

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

period.description: The time that the episode was in the specified class

condition.description: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter

rank.description: Ranking of the diagnosis (for each role type)

use.description: Role that this diagnosis has within the encounter (e.g. admission, billing, discharge …)

admitSource.description: From where patient was admitted (physician referral, transfer)

destination.description: Location/organization to which the patient is discharged

dietPreference.description: Diet preferences reported by the patient

dischargeDisposition.description: Category or kind of location after discharge

origin.description: The location/organization from which the patient came before admission

reAdmission.description: The type of hospital re-admission that has occurred (if any). If the value is absent, then this is not identified as a readmission

period.description: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

physicalType.description: The physical type of the location (usually the level in the location hierachy - bed room ward etc.)

individual.description: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

period.description: Period of time during the encounter that the participant participated
The time that the episode was in the specified status

status.description: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

display.description: Plain text narrative that identifies the resource in addition to the resource reference.

identifier.description: Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

reference.description: Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

display.description: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.

system.description: The identification of the code system that defines the meaning of the symbol in the code.

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

url.description: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.

period.description: Time period during which identifier is/was valid for use.

system.description: The namespace for the identifier value

lastUpdated.description: When the resource last changed - e.g. when the version changed.

profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

end.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

start.description: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.

coding.description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system.

text.description: Plain text representation of the concept

div.description: The actual narrative content, a stripped down version of XHTML.
